title: Dear LK: I cared for our dad. Now my greedy siblings want the inheritance
description: She cared for her stepdad through illness and death. Now she's disheartened that her siblings only seem to care about the inheritance. Financial therapist Lindsay Bryan-Podvin weighs in.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
